Deemos decides he has to find Inzola. He looks to Wrath one more time then =
starts toward the base...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealll=
izards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 3:58 P=
M
  Subject: Re: NBW RPG


  Wrath

  Wrath: Most likely...

  *Wrath says =
to Deemos

  *Wrath looks around him and sighs*

  Wrath: It's quiet around=
 here....


    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 3:38 PM
    Subject:=
 Re: NBW RPG


    Deemos nods to Wrath.

    "They say it's better to have=
 loved and lost to have never loved at all, but believe me, whomever said t=
hat was never in love!" Deemos said...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
=
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Wedn=
esday, August 02, 2000 2:54 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW RPG


      Wrath


 =
     *Wrath looks at Deemos*

      Wrath: I've felt pain before but never =
joy.....

      *Wrath says to Deemos*


        ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: We=
dnesday, August 02, 2000 2:20 PM
        Subject: Re: NBW RPG


        "If=
 you've never been in love, then you have never felt pain and joy." Deemos =
said to Wrath...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: il=
ovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday,=
 August 02, 2000 4:42 AM
          Subject: Re: NBW RPG


          Wrath

=

          Wrath: I really wouldn't know how you feel about these kinds of =
things because I've never been love.

          *Wrath sits there and sighs=
*


            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
  =
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2=
000 2:00 AM
            Subject: Re: NBW RPG


            "It's okay Wrath=
, thanks for not being mad, it was only a joke." Deemos said. He sat there =
and thought about Inzola...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
           From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
   =
           Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 12:18 AM
              Subject:=
 Re: NBW RPG


              Wrath


              Wrath: I don't care what=
 you think about my looks. I ignore insults like that. I go on what I think=
 of my looks. I don't care what you say about my looks but I'm aware that s=
he does. Maybe I should be going because things aren't going so peachy. Do =
you want me let you be alone?

              *Wrath asks Deemos*

         =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
       =
         To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Tuesday, August 01, =
2000 11:30 PM
                Subject: Re: NBW RPG


                Deemos=
 looked at the Maximal base.

                "Yeah, I thought the same thi=
ng." Deemos said.

                "Yeah but they would see us because they=
 are more friendly than the Maximals, the Preds have the courtesy to shoot =
us!" Inzola said.

                "Yeah, but I might be able to avoid gett=
ing shot, I'm the only one here good looking enough to make them distracted=
!" Deemos joked. Inzola slowly looked at Deemos.

                "What do =
you mean by that? Aren't I beautiful to you?" Inzola asked.

              =
  "Yes, but maybe not to others." Deemos said. Inzola stands up and growls.=


                "Well! If that's the way you feel, you don't have to worr=
y about the Preds, I just might shoot you!" Inzola said. She stormed off in=
to the Maximal base. Deemos sighed and turned to Wrath. He did a cheap smil=
e, but then remembered that he said Wrath wasn't good looking neither. He k=
new by the look on Inzola's face, that he would be sleeping alone tonight..=
.
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: i=
lovealllizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
 Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 8:34 PM
                  Subject: NBW RPG
=


                                                  Wrath


               =
   *Wrath stands next to Deemos*

                  Wrath: Why are we being=
 ignored by everyone? We could go into the Predacon Base and eat chunks of =
metal and dnace in front of their faces and steal info and they wouldn't se=
e us!

                  *Wrath says angerly and sits on the ground*



---=
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

=

---
